tech_news.title: Apple Developing AI Wearable Pin - The Information
tech_news.description: Apple is developing an AI-powered wearable pin the size of an AirTag that is equipped with multiple cameras, a speaker, microphones and wireless charging, according to people with direct knowledge of the project. The device could be released as early as 2027,…

tech_news.title: Apple to Revamp Siri as a Built-In iPhone, Mac Chatbot to Fend Off OpenAI - Bloomberg.com
tech_news.description: Apple Inc. plans to revamp Siri later this year by turning the digital assistant into the company’s first artificial intelligence chatbot, thrusting the iPhone maker into a generative AI race dominated by OpenAI and Google.

tech_news.title: Battlefield 6 Contaminated Map Revealed for Season 2 With Classic BF4 Map Also Confirmed to Return - IGN
tech_news.description: Battlefield Studios is giving fans a first look at content coming to Battlefield 6 Season 2 and beyond, including the reveal of one brand-new map and a returning Battlefield 4 map.

tech_news.title: Metroid Prime 4 is the last Nintendo game from producer Kensuke Tanabe, game imagined as first part of Sylux saga - Nintendo Everything
tech_news.description: According to Metroid Prime 4: Beyond producer Kensuke Tanabe, this will be the final game he’ll make for Nintendo. In an interview with Japanese magazine Nintendo Dream, Tanabe indicated that he’s on the verge of retirement. With Metroid Prime 4, he knew it w…

tech_news.title: Animal Crossing Aquarium Tour continues across the US this year - Nintendo
tech_news.description: Beginning in February, the Animal Crossing Aquarium Tour makes its Way to Multiple New and Returning Aquariums in 2026 The aquarium experience inspired by the Animal Crossing™: New Horizons game continues its journey in 2026! Starting Feb. 13, the A…

tech_news.title: “A more compact form without compromise”: Neural DSP downsizes its flagship Quad Cortex with the smaller but equally powerful Quad Cortex Mini - Guitar.com
tech_news.description: Neural DSP has unveiled the Quad Cortex Mini, offering the full sound and processing power of its flagship Quad Cortex amp modeller in a significantly smaller footprint.

tech_news.title: Techmarine: Dive Into Space Marine 2’s Upcoming New Class - Xbox Wire
tech_news.description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 deploys in the Xbox Game Pass next week, and a new playable character is set to follow soon after. How does it play? We’re here to find out!

tech_news.title: Eric Cartman & Crew Cause Chaos in Rocket League - Rocket League ®
tech_news.description: The gang has driven all the way from South Park, Colorado, to the arena. Complete Challenges in “Cartman’s Crash Out” to unlock Toppers based on the boys.
